title: Core Shipping Details
description: Core shipping details for a manifest.

manifest_id.description: Filename of the manifest used to ship this sample. Example: E4412_PBMC.

request.description: Assigns a request identifier (mandatory or optional) for the assay.

assay_priority.description: Priority of the assay as it appears on the intake form.

assay_type.description: Assay and sample type used. Example: Green-top tube - Plasma (Olink).

batch_number.description: The number corresponding to the batch sent for this assay.

box_number.description: Box identifier for samples, if sample shipment container includes multiple boxes for each sample/assay type.

assay_run_number.description: Assay run number for samples received.

tracking_number.description: Air bill number assigned to shipment. Example: 4567788343.

account_number.description: Courier account number to pay for shipping if available. Example: 45465732.

num_of_samples_shipped.description: Count of specimen(s) distributed by site.

num_of_samples_good.description: Number of Sample(s) Received in Good Condition.

ship_from.description: Shipping from [free text: person or organization, address, phone number, email address.]

ship_to.description: Shipping to [free text: person or organization, address, phone number, email address.]
